projects.title: Movie Listing
projects.description: This is a NextJS web application that retrives the latest top rated movies and also allows the user to search for a movie of their choosing.

projects.title: Memory Game
projects.description: This is a memory game built using React where the user clicks on two tiles and if they match then they will stay shown.

projects.title: Trivia
projects.description: This is a NextJS web application that retrives a list of quiz questions for the user to answer.
